00010 /**
00011  * Receptionist fund value (test data).
00012  */

00014 
00015 /** Receptionist Constructor Test Method
00016  *  @brief This method tests the constructor of the "Receptionist" class.
00017  *  @author Efstathios Xatzikiriakidis
00018  */
00019 void TReceptionist::testConstructor ()
00020 {
00021   Receptionist r (gFund);
00022 
00023   QVERIFY (r.getFund () == gFund);
00024 }
